WorkItem.Description:
When merging together css file from multiple folders the image paths should be rewritten to local the files. 
For instance consider the following mash config:

<root>
  <FileGroup Name="theme.css">
    <File Path="jqtouch/jqtouch.css" />
    <File Path="themes/jqt/theme.css" />
    <File Path="cutom.chirp.less" />
  </FileGroup>
</root>

themes/jqt/theme.css has references to images within its local img folder:
background:url(img/toolbar.png) - relative to themes/jqt/

When merged and minified the paths remain the same, so images will not be found.
WorkItem.Summary: Css mash and and image paths
